name: bloodsucker.
description:
-=-=-=-=-

you are a vampire.

when you suck blood, you also suck your victim's soul.

now you have a bigger soul.

what do you do with your massive soul?

invest in real estate.

-=-=-=-=-

arrow keys - movement.

enter - interact.

[1] [2] [3] - select property.

-=-=-=-=-

game by whycardboard.

font m3x6 by @managore.
